item.title: Projects
item.description: I 💜 building cool stuff 👨‍💻 💻 Here are some of my side projects, class projects and other works Drink bleach or do what now? Covid-HeRA: A dataset for risk-informed health decision making in the presence of COVID-19 misinformation. A paper that introduces the novel dataset Covid-HeRA (Covid Health Risk Assessment). This work studies the severity of each misinformation-related social media post, i.e., how harmful a message believed by the audience can be and what type of signals can be used to discover high malicious fake news and detect refuted claims.

item.title: Hi 👋
item.description: I’m Arkin Dharawat, a Computer Science Master’s student at UMass Amherst. I graduated from UIUC with a degree in Math and Computer Science in 12/19. My interests include (but are not limited too!) Natural Language Processing, Big Data and Machine Learning Infrastructure. You can view my resume here Love to read about AI? You can checkout my Medium blog where I ramble about Bots, Machine learning and other technologies(like Blockchain)
